Containers.Name: RTL8152/3/4/6 USB Drivers
Containers.Description:
This package contains the Realtek OOT Drivers and installs them, a reboot is required after installing the plugin (upgrading to a newer Unraid version maybe needs a second reboot too). ATTENTION: To utilize 2.5Gbit/s speeds you have to add this line at the bottom to your 'go' file: 'ethtool -s eth0 autoneg on advertise 0x80000000002f' (without quotes and modify eth0 to the corresponding adapter in your system)!
The following Chipsets are supported by this driver: RTL8152B, RTL8153/RTL8153B, RTL8154/RTL8154B, RTL8156/RTL8156B(S)(G)
Source: https://github.com/wget/realtek-r8152-linux
